data.why:
At this moment i build an oriented object module for validate and
    format an HTML document. I plane to make a web interface to show an
    exemple of the power and the simple use of this module. So, i have
    different kind of idea for new modules, and i already make "hack" or
    upgrade for some modules of CPAN (like Config::Crontab, i make
    modifications for this module to be compatible with open8 crontab.
    We use this "hack" for custumer of my companie. PS : I send this
    modification to the perl 5.6 pumpkin (raphael garcia who work with
    me :) )).

    See u soon, thanks for your answer...

    PS : Sorry for bad english language, i am french and it is not easy
    for me :).
